languages.text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} in half-cover until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer didn't spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their turn, they double their cover efficiency in half-cover until the end of the wearer's next turn.

If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} in half-cover until the end of the wearer's next turn.

languages.text: 如果装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中没有使用任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，则装备者的半身{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}加倍，直到装备者下个回合结束为止。
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} in half-cover until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者在回合中没有使用任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，则装备者的半身掩体效果加倍，直到装备者下个回合结束为止。

languages.text: Если персонаж в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} не тратил {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, эффективность {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичных укрытий{/g} для него удваивается до конца следующего хода.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} in half-cover until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Если персонаж в свой ход не тратил {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, эффективность частичных укрытий для него удваивается до конца следующего хода.
Если персонаж в свой ход не тратил {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, эффективность частичных укрытий для него удваивается до конца следующего хода.

languages.text: 使用者が自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターンで{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を使用しなかった場合、次のターン終了までハーフカバーの{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー効率{/g}が倍になる。
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} in half-cover until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: 自身のターンで{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を使用しない場合、次のターン終了までハーフカバーのカバー効果が倍増。

languages.text: Si el portador no gasta {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, duplica su {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} en cobertura parcial hasta el final de su próximo turno.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} in half-cover until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador no gasta {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} durante su turno, duplica su eficacia de cobertura en cobertura parcial hasta el final de su próximo turno.

languages.text: Hat der Träger während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} verbraucht, verdoppelt sich seine {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} in halber Deckung bis zum Ende des nächsten Zugs des Trägers.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} in half-cover until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Hat der Träger während seines Zuges keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} verbraucht, verdoppelt sich seine Deckungseffizienz in halber Deckung bis zum Ende des nächsten Zuges des Trägers.

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur n'a pas utilisé ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de sa couverture{/g} partielle est doublée jusqu'à la fin de son tour suivant.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} in half-cover until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur n'a pas utilisé ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pendant son tour, l'efficacité de sa couverture partielle est doublée jusqu'à la fin de son tour suivant.
